person.persName: John W. Houze (Switzerland County, Indiana, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Switzerland County, Indiana, farmer and soldier. Virginia native. Married to Sarah Houze. Father of William Houze, Samuel Houze, Eve Houze, Michael Houze, James Houze, Layfayette Houze, Francis M. Houze, Charles Houze and Ella Houze. Farmer in Switzerland County, Indiana in 1850. Resident of Switzerland County in 1860. Served in the 2nd Indiana Cavalry (U.S.A.) as a private from November 1, 1861 to January 5, 1865.
